name: Desstroke
description:
DESSTROKE is a demolition simulator that combines accurate demolition physics with freedom of action. You will have to make your neighbor angry by destroying every corner of his apartment.

This game is an excellent anti-stress, where everyone gets an opportunity to make a little prank and smash everything around. Who could refuse such a thing? Also, after you make all your fruition a reality you'll have to get away with it...or just take it...



You mistakenly walk into an apartment that isn't yours open wide and remember how you once worked at a house demolition job. But this time you decide not to demolish the whole house, but just one apartment. Of course, after all, behind the wall is yours!

It will be especially interesting to draw on the walls and throw grenades, which you have in abundance. But be careful: the time until the arrival of law enforcement in the form of a robot is limited. Try to plan everything so that there is time to have fun and escape.



Features :
  • Realistic physics of destroying objects
  • Realistic explosion simulation
  • Stunning graphics

Destroying other people's property has never been more fun!
